approval_data.project_summary: A simple web application to manage a list of tasks.
project_goals: Allow a user to add a task
Allow a user to see their list of tasks
target_audience: General users who need to manage tasks
approval_data.business_context: This project aims to provide a basic task management tool for individual users.

requirements.description: A user can create a new task with a text description.
A user can see a list of all created tasks.

functional_requirements: A user can create a new task with a text description.
A user can see a list of all created tasks.
success_criteria: Users can successfully view their task list
assumptions: Users have basic internet access to use the web application.
risks: Limited scope may not meet advanced user needs.

recommendations: Add more details for target audience, stakeholders, success criteria, constraints, assumptions, and risks.
Define specific metrics for 'load quickly' and 'secure'.

identified_gaps: Missing detailed user roles and permissions.
No explicit mention of data storage or persistence.
No details on error handling or validation.
No information on deployment or maintenance.
Non-functional requirements are high-level and lack specific metrics.
recommendations_for_completion: Define user authentication and authorization if applicable.
Specify how tasks will be stored (e.g., database, local storage).
Add requirements for input validation and error messages.
Include details on performance targets (e.g., load time in seconds) and security measures (e.g., data encryption).
Expand on project scope, out-of-scope items, and future enhancements.
